data.title: Poptastic
data.text: I visited during the Elgin Art and Soul Festival. There was a big line for service at Mama Lee's---probably enticed by the aromas wafting out of the open door. VERY friendly staff. No frills store---but the real attraction is the popcorn- so who CARES how it's decorated (or not).  MULTIPLE flavors of popcorn...but, I went with the traditional Chicago Mix (Caramel and Cheese). VERY tasty. A medium bag was approx. $5 and worth every penny.  They also have drinks and ices but, I didn't order any of that. The employee who served me encouraged me to have a "Poptastic Day".....cute.

data.title: Longest wait for lemonade
data.text: 10 minute wait for lemonade. Everyone was irritated. I wanted to like this place but it was too disorganized. Almost a 20 minute wait for lemonade. I'm glad people were buying from here but this place has to become more organized and systematic.

data.title: Love popcorn
data.text: I love that they opened a popcorn place in town.  The people are very nice and I enjoyed the different types of popcorn the offfer.  Hope other people stop in a buy.

data.title: Great Popcorn Shop
data.text: The owner is so friendly and accommodating.  He rotates different flavors depending  on the day.  Good popcorn and great service!

data.title: Awesome and unique place in Elgin!
data.text: The popcorn is delicious! But what really sticks out to me is the owner Chris's personality. He is always welcoming and enthusiastic. He has a passion for this business and it shines through. The creative flavors are worth checking out. Always something new!

data.title: so so
data.text: I guess I'm spoiled. I go through O'Hare often and stop by Garrett's. Pretty difficult to compete with them. I found both the popcorn to be dry and not very fresh.

data.title: THE BEST KETTLE CORN IN THE WORLD
data.text: Like I said, as far as I'm concerned the best kettle corn in the world, or at least that I've ever tried- not too heavily coated.  My husband likes their kettle corn and their Elgin mix (includes garlic popcorn but I can't remember what else).  I have never heard anyone who had their popcorn say a bad word about it.  Parking is the only challenge, but it's so good we've parked in the parking deck a block north and walked just for their popcorn.

data.title: Worthy of your time to Investigate ....
data.text:
Popcorn Shop only. 
Numerous varieties.
Pricing within a reasonable range.
Very Friendly Management is the key to me returning multiple times!
You want them to succeed..
Tricky off beat location and off street parking is hit or miss.
Worthy of giving yourself a mid-day treat.

data.title: Great Snack place in downtown Elgin
data.text: Love the decor and the staff.  Very patient and helpful with picking something out.  Loved the Elgin Mix!

data.title: Just What Elgin Needed!
data.text:
What a fun addition to downtown! Mama Lee's is a family-run shop serving some of the best popcorn I've ever tasted! They offer different flavors throughout the week with featured flavors. They have the traditional Elgin Mix, with butter, garlic, and caramel popcorn mixed together, which I cannot put down. They also have some pretty 'out there' flavors, but they've all been great. I've also tried their Watermelon, BBQ and Buffalo Ranch - all are so tasty. I know, I know, a fruity flavored popcorn? It sounds scary, but it's like the candy-coating on caramel corn, but with sweet fruity flavors too. I was surprised by how much I liked it. 

The popcorns comes in 2 sizes, I believe. The prices are a little higher than I would have expected, but I'm happy to pay their prices to see them continue their business. 

The staff is so friendly, you can really tell they put their heart and soul into this business. Life is always 'poptastic', which adds to the fun demeanor of the shop. I follow them on Facebook and they are always posting photos with their customers, always with families and kids. There aren't too many 'kid-friendly' shops downtown, so it's nice to see families here around the shop. 

I cannot wait to continue supporting this small business here in my neighborhood!

data.title: Popcorn experience
data.text: The workers were friendly. Cute decor. Tasting the popcorn was nice. It was very expensive just for popcorn

data.title: Great addition to Elgin Downtown
data.text: Nice owners, great popcorn! They opened even though it was after posted hours! Love the samples. Will definitely come back.

data.title: Great addition to downtown Elgin - delicious, flavored popcorn
data.text: This place recently opened up across the street from Side Street Studios. I tried the Chicago Mix (cheese and caramel) and Cherry Vanilla. The popcorn was delicious. Small bags were reasonably priced at below $6. I look forward to trying more flavors.
